## Installation

You can install _Mtrain Superclient_ via [pip] from [PyPI]:

```console
$ pip install mtrain-superclient
```

## Usage

### CLI

#### Add a regimen

```console
$ mtrain-superclient add <PATH TO REGIMEN.YML>
```

Please see the [Command-line Reference] for details.
